description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Do you feel lucky?  Try your luck and beat your friends. Up to four players can fill out tickets and then feel the electrifying suspense of the drawing.
description.short: Do you feel lucky?  Try your luck and beat your friends. Up to four players can fill out tickets and then feel the electrifying suspense of the drawing.
